}=_ref;// ref to hidden file input for loading JSON
const fileInputRef=useRef();const handleFileChange=e=>{const file=e.target.files[0];if(!file)return;const reader=new FileReader();reader.onload=ev=>{try{const shapes=JSON.parse(ev.target.result);onLoad(shapes);}catch{console.error("Invalid JSON file");}};reader.readAsText(file);e.target.value=null;};// Create invisible <input type="color"> elements at mount to drive custom picker
